short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Image Raptor, a tool for image bulk downloading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Image Raptor extension is a powerful tool designed for easy and efficient image downloading from web pages. With this extension, you gain access to a range of features that enhance your image downloading experience:

Browse through images displayed on the current webpage.
Apply filters based on dimensions like width and height, or refine results by URL.
Effortlessly download any image with just a single click.
